
---
title: '消息称罗技即将发布 MX Master 3S 鼠标：新传感器，按键更安静'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/38af0370-7c60-436d-83e1-563b4faa971e.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Fri, 06 May 2022 13:42:28 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/38af0370-7c60-436d-83e1-563b4faa971e.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="f6ff"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 5 月 6 日消息，据外媒 WinFuture 消息，罗技即将发布新款 MX Master 3S 鼠标。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="b2c1"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/38af0370-7c60-436d-83e1-563b4faa971e.png" w="1440" h="1100" title="消息称罗技即将发布 MX Master 3S 鼠标：新传感器，按键更安静" width="1440" height="626" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="1471">IT之家了解到，<strong>罗技现款 MX Master 3 于 2019 年 9 月问世</strong>，该系列已经近三年没有迭代。</p><p data-vmark="d146">据报道，罗技对 MX Master 3S 进行了几项内部改造。具体来说，MX Master 3S 搭载<strong>“Quiet Click”按钮</strong>，将比 MX Master 3 安静 90%。此外，罗技还为 MX Master 3S 配备了新的“<strong>8K 传感器</strong>”，DPI 提高了一倍，达到 8000。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="3419"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/12c7a381-e5ff-4829-8b3c-8aa37c9dc37d.png" w="1330" h="976" title="消息称罗技即将发布 MX Master 3S 鼠标：新传感器，按键更安静" width="1330" height="602" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="4d78"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/7751875b-afa8-4bad-a339-8d9a448346a7.png" w="1072" h="998" title="消息称罗技即将发布 MX Master 3S 鼠标：新传感器，按键更安静" width="1072" height="763" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="fcd5"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/72295627-5dab-4ea7-8439-d2b891d377a0.png" w="1048" h="904" title="消息称罗技即将发布 MX Master 3S 鼠标：新传感器，按键更安静" width="1048" height="707" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="89a9">▲ 图自 WinFuture</p><p data-vmark="df93">外媒称，罗技 MX Master 3S 售价将在 150 欧元（约 1051.5 元人民币）以上。</p><p data-vmark="6cf2">IT之家了解到，罗技 MX Master 3 当前在京东的售价为 599 元。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BANwJK1olXgYEUFddDUwUB18MHV8cXg4KUVdbC3tTXDdWRGtMGENDFlVDFhNSVzMXQA4KD1heSlpbDEIUC2cNEl0WQl9HCANtDVFwUQZ-ZQlwGFIEMSA-CCpNdwRMe1cZbQMCUVhdAE4fBF8LGVwXWwIHV1ltayx5XixYfgZKWAMyVF9tSSUeAWwKHlwlXQIHUVdcCEMQBV8IHF8VVAMHUV5cCU8QM28AHGtJH1RDFm5tOEgnM18IK1glA2gDB15dARtAUwFVGB9MBVACDDBdCU8TAmcNHlwlXwcDVlxt"
